name: CANNABISCASHCOIN
description: - Name CANNABISCASHCOIN - Symbol (ex: CCCO) - Decimals (18) - Owners Address 0x732D6Db0f3851797Ce06C71668e11a0cCCD6aB7E.

eventDecorators.name: Approval
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: Transfer
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

functionDecorators.name: approve
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

functionDecorators.name: decimals
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless this function is overridden; NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

functionDecorators.name: decreaseAllowance
functionDecorators.description: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

functionDecorators.name: increaseAllowance
functionDecorators.description: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

functionDecorators.name: name
functionDecorators.description: Returns the name of the token.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: symbol
functionDecorators.description: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.
